channel.title: Power Up Plug Alignment Issue
channel.description:
Just a minor issue - In Power Up at the end of the level, the left plug for the transformers is misaligned instead of being on the socket.
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21655145/2015-05-09_00001.jpg[/img] Map: BM_C2A1A
Getpos: setpos -1473.295166 2394.512695 104.031250;setang 13.095762 -103.091362 0.000000

item.title: Power Up Plug Alignment Issue
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Ugh, I’ve fixed that like…twice personally, and it keeps rebreaking. Will mark that down to fix.

Read full topic
